profile:
Some of the quality flooring products we offer include:
- Hardwood Flooring
- Carpeting
- Engineered Hardwood
- Laminate Flooring
- Vinyl Flooring
- Tile Flooring
- Boat Flooring

Next time you or a customer of yours is looking the flooring give us a try by visiting one of our stores or giving us a call. 

We have 2 locations to serve you from:
Steve: 3347 Lakefield Rd, Lakefield, ON. K0L2H0 - Call us at (705) 652-6222 or 705-868-9979 
or
Nick: 16 Matthew Street, Unit A Marmora, ON. K0K2M0 - Call us at (705)-868-7216

You can also visit our website www.kawarthaflooringliquidators.com for more information and store hours.

Contact our professionals today and we guarantee that you will be glad you did as we always look after our customers from start to finish.
